channel.description: Recent content in User guides on

item.title: Work masters reference
item.description: To make a production object visible to the Rhize data hub, you must define it as a data model. For a no-code interface to define an object, use the Work masters UI. These sections document all the objects that you can add through the UI, and the fields and properties that you can associate with them. All these models are based on the ISA-95 standard, and most are explictely defined in Part two, which describes the Role-based equipment hierarchy.
